title: Chinese chicken wings
ingredients: ['8 fresh chicken wings', '2 tablespoons rice wine, divided', '1 tablespoon of oil, more for frying', '1 teaspoon salt', '4 (5cm pieces) root ginger, sliced', '5 cloves garlic, sliced', '1 1/2 tablespoon soy sauce', '1 1/2 tablespoons oyster sauce', '1/2 tablespoon sugar']
